subject: Sales
title: When Buyers Vanish
description: Learn When Buyers Vanish in one minute.

hook.text: Three terrific meetings. A glowing follow-up email. Then dead silence. The buyer simply disappeared.

buildup.text: Ghosting plagues modern sales. Buyers vanish because disappearing feels easier than saying no.

discovery.text: The root cause is usually unclear next steps. Without a defined path, all momentum evaporates.

twist.text: Chasing harder makes it worse. Desperate follow-up emails push the ghost further into hiding.

climax.text: Prevent ghosting with micro-commitments at every step. Buyers who invest time don't vanish.

punchline.text: Buyers ghost when the next step isn't clear.

quiz.question: What is the main cause of buyer ghosting?
